org.yaml.snakeyaml

Class JavaBeanDumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yaml.snakeyaml.JavaBeanDumper
  • Deprecated. 
    use Yaml.dumpAs(data, Tag.MAP) instead

    public class JavaBeanDumper
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience utility to serialize JavaBeans.
